answers.answer_text: Answers related to the human gas exchange system.

sub_answers.text:
intercostal muscle - changes volume of thorax
goblet cell - release mucus
alveoli - exchange of gases
cilia - remove pathogens
trachea - carry air to bronchi
sub_answers.marking_notes:
four correct = 4 marks
three correct = 3 marks
two correct = 2 marks
one correct = 1 mark

1 mark for correct order of titles.
1 mark each for nitrogen, oxygen, carbon dioxide keys.
